subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chelsea and Barcelona gained commanding positions going into the second leg of the European Champions League quarterfinals. Branislav Ivanovic scored his first goals for Chelsea, and Didier Drogba added a third to lead the Blues over Liverpool, 3-1, in the first leg. Barcelona routed visiting Bayern Munich, 4-0, as Lionel Messi scored twice to raise his season total to 32.
